summary: When dad BUDDY and mom MOLLY are dognapped, their five adorable pups, the AIR BUDDIES, must save the day...
cast: Cascy Beddow|Jane Carr|Kelly Chapek|Patrick Cranshaw|Jarvis Dashkewytch|Tyler Foden|Karen Holness|Dan Joffre|Irene Karas Loeper|Richard Karn|Ellen Kennedy|Steve Makaj|Stuart Malinowski|Jaimie Mortimer-Lamb|Gig Morton|Holmes Osborne|Slade Pearce|Christian Pikes|Paul Rae|Cynthia Stevenson|John Tench|Ingrid Tesch|Mark Tisdale|Cainan Wiebe|Trevor Wright|Abigail Breslin|Michael Clarke Duncan|Josh Flitter|Spencer Fox|Skyler Gisondo|Dominic Scott Kay|Don Knotts|Debra Jo Rupp|Tom Everett Scott|Molly Shannon|Wallace Shawn|Jake D. title: Air Buddies
